name: sugARy halloween
description:
sugARy halloween is an augmented reality mobile game for children, made with Unity and Vuforia. To win the level displayed in real world, the player will have to physically move to overcome two challenges:
in the first one, they must collect the biggest number of candies, while in the second phase they will avoid e shoot projectiles to the naughty monsters of halloween who wants to steal the collected candies.
